header.title: olá mundo!
header.subtitle: , a software engineer based in Vancouver /Canada. I am passionate about building good looking interfaces, web apps, and everything in between!
header.text1: Hello world! I am a Software Engineer based in Vancouver /Canada. I received my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Catalão in 2022. For the past 4 years I have been working as a developer and I have experience with a wide range of technologies. You can find a list of my technical skills below.
header.text2: I am passionate about building web applications that are fast, responsive and accessible. I am also a fan of open source software and I am always looking for new ways to contribute to the community.

projects.title: Snack Delivery App
projects.description: With the Snack App, you can easily browse through a variety of restaurants and cuisines, place your order, and have your favorite dishes delivered straight to your home or office. We also offers the option to track your order in real-time, so you can know exactly when your food will arrive.

projects.title: Catering Website
projects.description: The Catering Website Project is an exciting venture that aims to revolutionize the way people plan and organize their events. With a focus on simplicity and functionality, our website will feature intuitive navigation, allowing users to easily browse through a wide range of catering options, explore menus, and request personalized quotes.
